login-form.head: Welcome Back!
login-form.description: Login with your account credentials below.

forgot-form.head: Forgot your password?
forgot-form.description: Type in your username and we will send you a recovery password e-mail to your e-mail address with instructions for how to reset your password..

messages.sending: Sending password recovery e-mail, please wait ...
messages.success: An e-mail has been sent to your e-mail address with instructions for resetting your password.
messages.error: Account doesnâ€™t exist or might be deactivated

reset-form.head: Reset your password
reset-form.description: Type in the new password you want to set for your account.
reset-form.new-password-length-validation-msg: Password must be between 8 and 20 characters.
reset-form.new-password-pattern-validation-msg: Password must have uppercase, lowercase, special characters, and numbers.
reset-form.confirm-password-validation-msg: Confirm password must match new password.

messages.error-link-expired: Password recovery link has expired, please recover your password again for a new link.
messages.success-text: Your new password is now set for your account, you can try and login again from
